resources.string:
CONTROLS:
	Bar+joyStick:
	Use the bar on the left to accelerate/brake
	The joystick on the right to lean, and Flip/center button to turn around
Joystick/D-Pad:
	Push up to accelerate, down to brake/reverse
	left and right tilt, Press the Flip/center button to turn around
CUSTOM LEVELS:
	Please put custom levels in /sdcard/xlvls/
	new levels can be made with inksmoto - the level editor for xMoto
	The levels in the xMoto pack are from the game xMoto - and are licenced under the GPL

Made by Chozabu@gmail.com - Alex P-B.

Using andengine.
-Uses Box2d for physics.
-OpenGL for graphics.
Handy info from all over the internet :)
The levels in the xMoto pack are from the game xMoto - and are licenced under the GPL
